name: mazel tov
description: mazel tov is an open hearted cultural space in the city's center, a streamlined and comforting place focusing on gastronomy in the 7th district, in the middle of the historically jewish quarter. our middle eastern urban garden awaits its quests seven days a week from noon until midnight: mazel tov! ps: please note that our restaurant is not a kosher restaurant. hope to see you soon, mazel tov team

name: twentysix
description: twentysix budapest is the first of its kind, a cozy urban jungle and feel-good hub for all the nature and gastro friends located in the real heart of budapest with 4 elements. garden° is a nutritious, soulful mediterranean restaurant. shop° is our zero waste coffee & shop, an eco-friendly gourmet delicates. studio° where you can enjoy every day our yoga classes. house° brings a unique concept of kitchen workshops and space for tailored events. all in one bright, sunlit scene of the vivid budapest downtown - where your body, mind, soul and coolness meet.

name: fat mama
description: we are proud to be the first restaurant in budapest to use bertha in our kitchen. bertha is a charcoal oven that creates a special atmosphere in the restaurant. you feel like participating in a memorable garden party and in the hand of a well trained chef, bertha produces super tasty, crispy food let it be veggies, meat or fish. fat mama eatery is the only restaurant in the city center that has a real smoker pit available 24/7. our smoker pit was provided by the uncrowned king of hungarian bbq, máriusz adorjányi. we prepare traditional bbq food in it meaning long hours of preparation at low temperature. the perfectly cooked, soft and juicy slices of meat can be enjoyed in a cool and easy-going environment.
